root.name: Heavenly Guardian
root.description: OverviewHeavenly Guardian is a Scrolling Shooter released for the Wii, and later the PS2. The game was originally set to be a direct sequel to Pocky and Rocky, but Starfish lost the license to the name, so it instead is a Spiritual Successor to it. The original Japanese title is "Yukinkoto Daisenpuu: Saiyuki to Koyukino Hie Hie Daisoudou."The game was brought to North America by UFO Interactive Games.
